programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Finds a Hobby / Paddington and the Stamp) S1 (2/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Finds a Hobby / Paddington and the Stamp»Paddington does not have a hobby like all of the Browns, but Mrs. Brown finds out what Paddington is good at. // Paddington gets his arm stuck in a post box after accidentally using Mr. Gruber's rare Penny Black stamp on his letter to Aunt Lucy.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Wardrobe / Paddington Helps with Homework) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Wardrobe / Paddington Helps with Homework»Paddington is accidentally delivered inside a wardrobe to Mr. Curry's house and must get out before he is discovered. // Paddington tries to help Judy with her geography homework and ends up being the subject of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le recyclage) S2 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Le recyclage»There is nothing more fun than sailing a boat .. isn't it? Peppa is a little dissatisfied with her boat at first, but then she discovers that sailing with paper boats is the most fun!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le bureau de papa Pig) S2 (22/52)
programme.desc: «Le bureau de papa Pig»Peppa et George vont au bureau de leur père et rencontrent les gens avec qui il travaille...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'île aux pirates) S2 (23/52)
programme.desc: «L'île aux pirates»Peppa et ses amis passent une journée sur le bateau du grand-père de Peppa...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La vente de charité) S2 (19/52)
programme.desc: «La vente de charité»La garderie de Peppa organise une vente de charité pour réunir de l'argent pour un nouveau toit. Peppa et ses amis donnent chacun un jouet pour la vente...

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (La Fête des récoltes) S6 (n°603)
programme.desc: «La Fête des récoltes»Holiday Cooks Molly and Gil must retrieve a Golden Tomato from magical Tall Tale Farms. But first, their food knowledge is tested by three guardians!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Une histoire avec Camila) S3 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Une histoire avec Camila»We dive deeper into American Sign Language and the Deaf community. Camila the librarian wants to tell a story with us using ASL, but what story? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Un super moment avec Blue) S3 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Un super moment avec Blue»Tickety's Big Musical Morning!: Good Morning! We celebrate morning routines with Tickety as we sing a brand-new wakeup song and work out what special time is coming up. (S3, ep 11).

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Bonnie's Mom / The Ocelot's Tale) S2 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Bonnie's Mom / The Ocelot's Tale»Santi and crew must team up with Bonnie to rescue her mom, pirate Billie Bones, from her sneaky first mate! // A fun sleepover in Larimar's Museum turns into an adventure when one of the pieces of art comes to life.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Le festival des fruits) S2 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Le festival des fruits»The Fruit Festival: Santiago and his family team up to save the Fruit Festival when Enrique crashes the party and steals all the fruit! (S2, ep 6a).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le mot de passe secret) S2 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Le mot de passe secret»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Extreme Dodge Bubble) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Extreme Dodge Bubble»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Potato Stew) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Potato Stew»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger) S9 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger»When Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties, an alarm is set off and the Paw Patrol must rescue them. // Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions - an aircraft and must be rescued from an out-of-control flight.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Makes the News) S2 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Paddington Makes the News»Paddington Makes the News: Paddington, Jonathan & Judy decide to create a newspaper but they need a front page story! (S2, ep 13b).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La leçon de danse) S1 (31/52)
programme.desc: «La leçon de danse»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'orage) S1 (32/52)
programme.desc: «L'orage»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le lavage de la voiture) S1 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Le lavage de la voiture»Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Strawberries) S1 (1/78)
programme.desc: «Strawberries»Anna and Froga are excited to make the best strawberry pie ever with the first strawberries of the season. Anna makes a plan to distract Christopher while they make the pie!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Swing) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «The Swing»When Anna and Froga discover the old seat of their swing, they are excited to hang it on the apple tree. But the ropes to attach it have gone missing!The two friends' search for the missing ropes turns out to be more difficult than they had imagined!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (No Time Like the Present Store) S3 (n°3)
programme.desc: «No Time Like the Present Store»At the Present Store, Joe's running a contest, whoever guesses the mystery present gets to unwrap it! What could be inside this special gift?! We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La fresque de la mini patrouille / La pomme de terre arc-en-ciel) S7 (16/26)
programme.desc: «La fresque de la mini patrouille / La pomme de terre arc-en-ciel»The Mini Patrol and the Pups race to the rescue to save a local mural before the rain comes. // Farmer Al and Yumi find out their garden is full of holes and their one of a kind potato is missing. Now the pups must find the potato thief!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La grenouille qui vole) S2 (2/26)
programme.desc: «La grenouille qui vole»Marshall's new pet frog, Smiley, is going to be in a jumping contest!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Fin de partie / Jeunesse éternelle) S2 (13/20)
programme.desc: «Fin de partie / Jeunesse éternelle»Kai invents a new Virtual Reality training game, but Stu and Safia enter the game and want to be the winners! // The Deer Squad must help the city's residents when they break out in spots thanks to Sir Steel's new face cream.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Lady Monkey Mech / Critter Care Calamity) S2 (9/20)
programme.desc: «Lady Monkey Mech / Critter Care Calamity»Sir Steel wrecks havoc during Harvest Parade in 'Lady Monkey Mech', then in 'Critter Care Calamity', Pollen from Bobbi's snuffleblooms makes everyone start getting super sneezes!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin) S1 (9/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin»Mr Brown has forgotten to get Mrs Brown a Birthday present, Paddington decides to hold a surprise party. // Judy does not like Violin lessons so hides from Ms Potts. Paddington takes up the challenge. Watch out ears!

programme.title: Mini Chef (S'mores) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «S'mores»S'Mores: Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends. (S1, ep 4b).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens) S1 (23/52)
programme.desc: «The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens»Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild) S1 (22/52)
programme.desc: «The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild»Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le Fort de l'Aquamitié) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Le Fort de l'Aquamitié»Fort Fin-ship: When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. (S2, ep 1a).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le gobelin farceur / Baby, super requin) S2 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Le gobelin farceur / Baby, super requin»Goldie blames her missing treats on a monster. // Vigo's plan to turn everyfishy into babies backfires.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Detectives) S1 (3/78)
programme.desc: «The Detectives»Froga is desperate. Her favourite toy Super Pebble has disappeared! Now Anna and Ron work with Froga play detectives. Thanks to a thoughtful gift from Christopher, Froga ends up finding her missing Super stone herself!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Super Christophe) S1 (4/78)
programme.desc: «Super Christophe»Christopher visits Anna with his " Super Christopher" costume, ready for adventure! But being a superhero comes with a whole set of challenges. Christopher isn't just a superhero. He's also a super friend.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Very Busy Afternoon) S1 (17/78)
programme.desc: «A Very Busy Afternoon»A Very Busy Afternoon: Froga organises a gathering to share jam sandwiches with everyone, Ron and Christopher want to show off their acrobatic frisbee skills, (S1, ep 17).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Four-Leaf Clover) S1 (18/78)
programme.desc: «The Four-Leaf Clover»The Four-Leaf Clover: Anna and her friends have organized a hula hoop competition and Froga relies on her four-leaf clover to help her! Froga is convinced there is no way she'll ever win. (S1, ep 18).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Collection) S1 (19/78)
programme.desc: «The Collection»The Collection: Upon seeing Ron's stick collection, Froga learns for the first time what "a collection" is. Anna would like to create one of her own. (S1, ep 19).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Fixing Things) S1 (20/78)
programme.desc: «Fixing Things»Bubu catches a cold, he's unable to fix Ron's spinning top and Christopher's broken piano. While Bubu is resting, she "fixes" the broken items for him. Christopher's piano starts playing bubbles, Froga realizes she should leave the fixing to Bubu.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le déjeuner) S1 (34/52)
programme.desc: «Le déjeuner»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camping) S1 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Le camping»Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La princesse fatiguée) S1 (36/52)
programme.desc: «La princesse fatiguée»Papa Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a sleepy princess. In the story Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mama Pig is the queen and Papa Pig is the king.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La cabane dans l'arbre) S1 (37/52)
programme.desc: «La cabane dans l'arbre»Peppa and George visit Grandma Pig and Grandpa Pig. Grandpa Pig built them a tree house.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camion de pompier) S3 (13/52)
programme.desc: «Le camion de pompier»When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Princesse Peppa) S3 (14/52)
programme.desc: «Princesse Peppa»Mamie et Papy Cochon viennent pour un dîner avec maman et papa Cochon, mais Peppa et George sont trop fatigués pour aller au lit, jusqu'à ce qu'on leur racontent une histoire...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Teddy Maternello) S3 (15/52)
programme.desc: «Teddy Maternello»Mamie et Papy Cochon viennent pour un dîner avec maman et papa Cochon, mais Peppa et George sont trop fatigués pour aller au lit, jusqu'à ce qu'on leur racontent une histoire.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (It's Only a Mystery...) S1 (35/52)
programme.desc: «It's Only a Mystery...»Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue?

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet»Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (The Chicken Circus!) S4 (n°3)
programme.desc: «The Chicken Circus!»Blaze, AJ, and Darington are in the front row for the amazing Chicken Circus! But when Crusher accidentally launches the chickens far, far away, it's up to Blaze and Darington to get their feathered friends back to the big top!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La Course vers le Rocher de l'Aigle) S2 (18/20)
programme.desc: «La Course vers le Rocher de l'Aigle»Blaze and AJ visit VelocityVille, a town full of race cars where everybody loves to go fast! When a snooty car named Speedrick traps all the other racers, Blaze must transform into a super-fast race car to free his new friends.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Les rollers de Danny / La surprise de Ryder) S7 (14/26)
programme.desc: «Les rollers de Danny / La surprise de Ryder»A mix-up delivery leads to Ms. Marjorie and Danny speeding out of control in Adventure Bay. Now the Pups must rescue them. // Ryder's present ends up in the jungle and Carlos is trapped in a Jungle Gym. It's up to the Pups to save them.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Deux maires en détresse / Le jeu des cow-boys) S7 (15/26)
programme.desc: «Deux maires en détresse / Le jeu des cow-boys»While out ice fishing in the North Country, Mayors Goodway and Humdinger, along with Chickaletta, get stuck in an ice crevasse. // The Wingnuts' farm plays host to a rootin' tootin Game Show hosted by Cowgirl Beryl!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le concours de tournesol / Le voleur de lune) S2 (10/20)
programme.desc: «Le concours de tournesol / Le voleur de lune»Ricardo hosts a sunflower competition, but Lola is worried hers is ill - surely a little Wood Power will perk it up? // Lady Fluffpot wants a statue made of moon rock, but the deer know that messing with the moon is a bad idea!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (A Hole Lot of Trouble) S2 (n°18)
programme.desc: «A Hole Lot of Trouble»Bobbi gets carried away while digging for ground nuts and puts the forest and its residents in real danger.

programme.desc: «Extreme Dodge Bubble»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.desc: «Potato Stew»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.desc: «Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger»When Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties, an alarm is set off and the Paw Patrol must rescue them. // Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions - an aircraft and must be rescued from an out-of-control flight.

programme.desc: «Paddington Makes the News»Paddington Makes the News: Paddington, Jonathan & Judy decide to create a newspaper but they need a front page story! (S2, ep 13b).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa fait de l'exercice) S1 (42/52)
programme.desc: «Papa fait de l'exercice»Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le rangement) S1 (43/52)
programme.desc: «Le rangement»Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'aire de jeu) S1 (44/52)
programme.desc: «L'aire de jeu»Peppa et George s'amusent avec leurs amis au jardin d'enfant. Si Peppa adore faire de la balançoire, George, lui, a le vertige...

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Photo) S1 (5/78)
programme.desc: «The Photo»Polaroid camera, she decides to take pictures of all her friends. Everyone thinks it's a great idea and Anna makes some great portraits. But things get complicated when she tries to take a group shot of everyone!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (We Love Nature) S1 (6/78)
programme.desc: «We Love Nature»Anna and her friends are planning an amazing picnic in nature. But Bubu's bag is too heavy, Christophe can't resist eating all the strawberries! (S1, ep 6).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'arbre de Barbapapa / L'anniversaire des barbabébés) S1 (1/52)
programme.desc: «L'arbre de Barbapapa / L'anniversaire des barbabébés»Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La fête des lumières avec Blue) S3 (4/18)
programme.desc: «La fête des lumières avec Blue»Everyone's at Periwinkle's house celebrating Hanukkah! Well, not everyone, exactly. There's a special guest coming to our party! Who could it be?

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest) S9 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest»With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les mini héros / Un visage dans l'espace) S2 (14/20)
programme.desc: «Les mini héros / Un visage dans l'espace»When the younger animals in the forest want to be like their heroes Deer Squad, things don't go as planned as Sir Steel steps in. // The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (De drôles de nuages / La ruée vers la comète de cristal) S2 (n°11)
programme.desc: «De drôles de nuages / La ruée vers la comète de cristal»Candy floss clouds cause confusion in 'Every Cloud', and then in 'Rainbow Comet Rush', can Jade and the Deer Squad help the crystal comet release its rainbow colours? (S2, ep 11).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Everest, la petite nouvelle !) S2 (6/26)
programme.desc: «Everest, la petite nouvelle !»The PAW Patrol rolls out in their new PAW Patroller to save Jake when he gets stranded in the ice fields, but a new pup also pops up to lend a paw, the brave ranger, Everest!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La moufette / Le baleineau) S3 (20/26)
programme.desc: «La moufette / Le baleineau»When Everest gets sprayed by a skunk, the pups delicately try to tell her she needs a bath! // The pups put a new spin on freeze tag after they fly far north to help free a baby whale that's trapped under the ice.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Liberty Meets a New Friend / Pups Save the Pup Pup Boogie Contest) S9 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Liberty Meets a New Friend / Pups Save the Pup Pup Boogie Contest»Liberty mistakenly brings a bear into town, thinking it's someone's pet. She must fix her mistake and rescue Chickaletta. // Francois' hot-air balloon goes out of control before the Pup Pup Boogie Contest. The Pups, with Liberty, race to the rescue.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat' Patrouille des mers : Les Chiens pirates) S4 (19/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille des mers : Les Chiens pirates»Carlos and Tracker get stranded on an island in the search for buried treasure.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Mission Paw Mission Secrète : Grosse Frayeur / Il Faut Sauver Monsieur le Maire) S4 (7/26)
programme.desc: «Mission Paw Mission Secrète : Grosse Frayeur / Il Faut Sauver Monsieur le Maire»While on safari with Carlos and Tracker, Mayor Humdinger steals a magic mask.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Mission secrète : La couronne) S4 (4/26)
programme.desc: «Mission secrète : La couronne»Chase and the team are called to Barkingburg to keep an eye on the crown.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Mission Secrète : Le trône royal) S4 (10/26)
programme.desc: «Mission Secrète : Le trône royal»Sweetie plans Sweetie plans to steal the actual royal throne, so she can rule.to steal the actual royal throne, so she can rule.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (All Paws on Deck) S9 (n°16)
programme.desc: «All Paws on Deck»Ryder calls on every member of the Paw Patrol to stop a hi-tech kid inventor from demolishing Adventure Bay so she can build her own dream city in its place.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête des pirates de Danny) S3 (16/52)
programme.desc: «La fête des pirates de Danny»C'est l'anniversaire de Danny Chien. Avec l'aide de grand-papa Chien et grand-père Cochon, les enfants se lancent à une chasse au trésor des pirates...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La visite de monsieur Patate) S3 (17/52)
programme.desc: «La visite de monsieur Patate»Tous les habitants de la ville sont ravis de rencontrer monsieur Patate qui arrive pour ouvrir un nouveau centre sportif...

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Battle) S1 (39/52)
programme.desc: «The Battle»Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Hiccupism / Silence please) S1 (32/52)
programme.desc: «Hiccupism / Silence please»Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Ninja Blaze) S4 (11/20)
programme.desc: «Ninja Blaze»Ninja Master Blackbelt is training Blaze and AJ to be powerful ninjas when Crusher and Pickle accidentally launch themselves onto an icy mountain! Now Blaze and AJ must use their new ninjas skills to rescue them.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le Rallye Polaire) S3 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Le Rallye Polaire»Blaze and his friends head to VelocityVille and transform into racecars for the Polar Derby, a wintry race through the snow! But when racecar Crusher knocks them off-course, the pals must keep cool to stay on track.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le sauvetage du mini-panze / L'ascension d'el grande) S7 (18/26)
programme.desc: «Le sauvetage du mini-panze / L'ascension d'el grande»Big Hairy's little brother falls into a hole and Tracker gets carried away by Big Hairy. It's time for a Jungle Rescue!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La reine cot-cot / La montgolfière du désert) S7 (19/26)
programme.desc: «La reine cot-cot / La montgolfière du désert»We see a strange land where Chickaletta is royalty in 'Pups Save Queen Cluck-Cluck', then in 'Pups Save a Desert Flounder', Travelling Travis's balloon gets caught on the Flounder.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La chasse aux gros insectes / Le Cerf-ball) S2
programme.desc: «La chasse aux gros insectes / Le Cerf-ball»Lady Fluffpot hates mini-beasts - and Sir Steel creates MEGA-beasts that the Deer squad must deal with. // Things get competitive when Sir Steel takes on the Deer Squad for the Deer Ball Cup - but who's bending the rules?

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Cirque Cosmique) S2 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Cirque Cosmique»Sir Steel's circus takes Lady Fluffpot out of this world, can the Deer Squad bring her back to earth safely?
